title: Most Significant Reduction in CO2 Emissions
description: Ukraine achieved an impressive 82.66% reduction in carbon dioxide emissions from 1990 to 2023, showcasing its commitment to environmental sustainability.

title: Highest Military Expenditure as a Percentage of GDP
description: In 2023, Ukraine allocated 36.65% of its GDP to military expenditure, highlighting its focus on national defense.

title: Lowest Commercial Bank Branch Density
description: With only 0.39 branches per 100,000 adults in 2023, Ukraine has one of the lowest densities of commercial bank branches globally.

title: Significant Decline in Population Growth
description: Ukraine experienced a population decline of 8.42% in 2023, indicating demographic challenges.

title: Highest Import Unit Value Index
description: In 2023, Ukraine's import unit value index reached 226.9, reflecting increased costs of imported goods compared to 2015.

title: Lowest Stocks Traded Value Relative to GDP
description: In 2019, the total value of stocks traded in Ukraine was a mere 0.00086% of GDP, indicating a minimal stock market activity.

title: Largest Reduction in Total Greenhouse Gas Emissions
description: Ukraine reduced its total greenhouse gas emissions by 77.69% from 1990 to 2023, marking a significant environmental achievement.

title: Lowest Gross Domestic Savings
description: In 2023, Ukraine's gross domestic savings were negative, amounting to -$10.36 billion, indicating economic challenges.

title: Minimal Open Defecation Practices
description: As of 2017, only 0.0012% of Ukraine's population practiced open defecation, reflecting strong sanitation infrastructure.

title: Minimal Impact of Health Expenditure on Poverty
description: In 2018, only 0.01% of Ukraine's population was pushed further below the $2.15 poverty line due to out-of-pocket health expenses, indicating effective health policies.

title: Highest Military Expenditure as a Percentage of Government Spending
description: In 2023, 58.17% of Ukraine's government expenditure was dedicated to military spending, underscoring its defense priorities.

title: Significant Decline in Rural Population Growth
description: Ukraine's rural population decreased by 9.01% in 2023, highlighting rural demographic shifts.

title: Significant Decline in Urban Population Growth
description: In 2023, Ukraine's urban population growth rate was -8.17%, indicating urban demographic challenges.

title: High Net Borrowing Relative to GDP
description: Ukraine's net borrowing was 19.84% of GDP in 2023, reflecting fiscal challenges.
